name: Ultimate Slasher
description:
This game was made in 48h for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam !

I wanted to make something absurd, a dungeon crawler-like with no enemy : you pick  treasures in every room and see your stats growing as they are taking all the screen. I originally thought about a reflection around player empowerment and the realization that power is always expressed on something/someone. 

The result is close but unfortunately I didn't have time to make it any longer. I hope you'll enjoy the experience anyway !

(And sorry, at the last minute before posting the game, the end screen didn't want to appear so you have to close the game manually :/ )

Game Design, Programming, Graphic Design, Sound Design, Music & Instruments : Félix Belthoise (@Azathothep)

Fonts : Blackadder ITC, Bowlby One SC, Charlemagne Std
